name: Batman
description: Half man, half baseball bat. Has a heartwood of gold.
superpower: Swings into action without hesitation. Can survive with wood instead of internal organs.

name: Hatman
description: A connoisseur of all hats, big and small.
superpower: Can instantaneously tell how large a hat is by smell or taste.

name: Flatman
description: Quarter construction paper on his mother's side.
superpower: Can slide under doors but is defeated by scissors

name: Matman
description: Has a skin of tough, waterproof fibers.
superpower: Efficiently cleans people's shoes before entering a house.

name: B-Flatwoman
description: Computer programmer by day, musician by night.
superpower: Has perfect pitch but only for B-Flat.

name: Formatwoman
description: A doer of deeds and other documents.
superpower: Can complete formats before autocomplete ruins everything.

name: The Aristocrat
superpower: Can use more resources in a lifetime than a million regular people.

name: The Acrobat
description: They have an uncanny sense of balance.
superpower: Is unaffected by the feeling of falling and catching yourself when lying down half-asleep

name: The Diplomat
description: Your typical Gen Z teen but with one huge advantage.
superpower: When their parents are arguing in a restaurant, The Diplomat does not feel awkward and can divert the server's attention.

name: The Mosquito
superpower: Can reproduce and bite as fast as light.

name: Donald Trump
description: President, Boeing 757, eats McDonald's, uses golden toilet.
superpower: Here comes the money... Here comes the money... Money Money Money Money Money

name: Weslie
superpower: Can run faster than a wolf.

name: Briar
description: Clumsy fat bear who always bullies a lumberjack.
superpower: Bramble, let's go beat up Logger Vick!

name: Francesco Bernoulli
description: A superior Italian supercar who got beaten by a random American redneck car.
